text: A handling charge of ₹100 is added for oversized cargo.
Unexpected traffic congestion in Delhi resulted in a 6-hour delay.
Shipment from Delhi to Pune must be delivered within 24-48 hours.
If snowfall continues, deliveries to Shimla may be suspended.
Cross-border shipments fall under Global jurisdiction.
The shipping service is governed by laws under Indian jurisdiction.
A penalty of 1.5% applies if the carrier misses the delivery window.
Temperature spikes beyond 40°C caused refrigeration failure.
Carrier is liable up to ₹50,000 for cargo damage during transport.
Interstate checkpoints caused long queues, delaying multiple trucks.
Heavy snow caused road closures, delaying shipments by 18 hours.
Temperature-sensitive pharmaceuticals must be transported in insulated containers.
Delivery timelines during cyclone warnings may be extended.
Flash floods washed out several bridges, affecting rural deliveries.
A penalty of 2% per day applies if the shipment to Bangalore is delayed beyond 24 hours.
